current.pages-sidebar-content: Blockshop comes bundled with four presets - Deli, Beat, Beauty and Playhouse. All themes can be customized in the Theme settings allowing users to build a unique look in minutes.
current.home-widget-text-1-description: Block Shop theme is inspired by Flat UI design - boasting spacious layouts, block colours & bold typography with a minimal user interface enduring trends with simplicity and style.  Content is divided in large customisable blocks giving you freedom to adjust layout, colour, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity. Retina-ready, full responsive for widescreen and mobile devices, the Block Shop is your one stop shop.
